description: Introduction Antarctic LIVE TRADING ARENA Hong Kong Section is Antarctic s special offline trading event during Consensus HK 2026. We will invite trading-focused KOLs and professional traders to form two teams and compete under the same rules and time window while the audience can watch live, join interactions, and witness the final results together. Prize Pool & Honors Champion Team Prize Pool: 3,000 USDT Runner-up Team Prize Pool: 2,000 USDT Individual Champion Honor: Official trophy / champion banner AX points rewards Prediction Results Announcement: Prediction results and rewards will be announced after the event (subject to official rules) Agenda 14:30 15:30 Check-in 15:30 15:50 Opening Session (Welcome Rules Overview) 15:50 17:10 Round 1: Live Trading Battle (80 mins) 17:10 17:30 Mid-break 17:30 17:50 Final Round Championship Battle (30 mins) 17:50 18:10 Final Settlement Awards Results 18:10 19:00 Networking
